content: And then just thinking about the downstream side and little bit more kind of near term on the throughput guide, and I understand you guys -- you give only annual guidance, but just hoping maybe some high-level color, and it sounds like you're getting superior with partially at some point, mid-quarter and maybe a little later for Toledo. But it -- as I think a lot of people appreciate, over the last 2 or 3 years, an increasing amount of my time has really been spent on working on pathways on a larger scale for the industry, but particularly focused on Cenovus' GHG reduction plan.
